zh.title: 美国 45Q 碳氧化物封存税收抵免 (IRA 2022 增强版)
zh.description: 通过《通胀削减法案》(IRA) 对 45Q 条款进行了重大增强，将专用封存抵免额提升至 85 美元/吨，并引入直接支付与转让机制，是全球 CCUS 货币化的核心标杆。
zh.pore_space_rights: 主要归私人所有（取决于各州法律）
zh.liability_transfer: 通过 Class VI 许可建立长期管理机制
zh.cross_border_rules: 允许境内跨州运输，跨境需符合伦敦议定书框架
zh.third_party_access: 非强制，多由市场合同决定
zh.closure_criteria: 地质压力稳定且无泄漏风险证据（Class VI 标准）
zh.financial_assurance: 强制性财务担保（用于井筒封堵与泄漏风险）
zh.public_consultation: 强制性 (EPA 环境正义审核)
zh.legal_citation: 26 U.S. Code § 45Q - 碳氧化物封存抵免

en.title: Section 45Q Tax Credit for Carbon Oxide Sequestration (IRA 2022 Enhanced)
en.description: The Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) significantly enhanced 45Q credits, raising sequestration value to $85/t and introducing direct pay mechanisms, anchoring the global CCUS value chain.
en.liability_transfer: Long-term stewardship via Class VI permit framework
en.cross_border_rules: Allowed via bilateral arrangements; aligns with London Protocol intent
en.closure_criteria: Pressure stabilization and evidence of no leakage (Class VI)
en.financial_assurance: Mandatory financial security for plugging and leakage
en.legal_citation: 26 U.S. Code § 45Q - Credit for carbon oxide sequestration

zh.title: 欧盟净零工业法案 (NZIA)
zh.description: 欧盟核心战略立法，确立了到 2030 年实现年度 5000 万吨二氧化碳注入能力的目标，并规定油气生产商承担封存义务。
zh.liability_transfer: 遵循欧盟 CCS 指令 (2009/31/EC)，通常 20 年后转移
zh.cross_border_rules: 欧盟内部完全打通，支持跨境输送网络
zh.third_party_access: 受欧盟指令保护的公平准入权
zh.legal_citation: EU Directive 2009/31/EC 第 18 条 (责任转移)

en.title: Net-Zero Industry Act (NZIA)
en.description: Key EU legislation mandating a 50 Mtpa annual injection capacity by 2030 and assigning storage construction obligations to oil and gas producers.
en.liability_transfer: Aligns with CCS Directive; typically 20-year transfer
en.cross_border_rules: Fully integrated within EU single market
en.third_party_access: Fair access rights under EU directive

zh.title: 中国 CCUS 12 项国家标准 (GB/T 46870-46880)
zh.description: 2026 年 7 月起实施的 12 项国家标准，系统性覆盖了捕集、输送、封存及减排量评估，是中国 CCUS 规范化发展的制度基石。
zh.pore_space_rights: 国家所有（宪法规定地下资源归国家所有）
zh.liability_transfer: 目前由运营商承担，国家储备金机制研究中
zh.cross_border_rules: 目前仅限境内，暂无跨境封存实例
zh.third_party_access: 鼓励共享，但缺乏强制性开放规则
zh.co2_definition: 未明确法律定义（监管缺口）
zh.closure_criteria: 目前主要依赖工程验收，缺乏长期稳定性判定标准
zh.financial_assurance: 暂无强制性财务保证机制
zh.incentive_duration_years: 基于 CCER 签发周期

en.title: China 12 National Standards for CCUS (GB/T 46870-46880)
en.description: A set of 12 national standards effective from July 2026, covering capture, transport, storage, and emission reduction assessment, forming the institutional foundation for China's CCUS sector.
en.liability_transfer: Operator-led; State reserve mechanism under research
en.cross_border_rules: Domestic focus; no cross-border framework yet
en.closure_criteria: Engineering acceptance based; lacks long-term stability criteria
en.financial_assurance: No mandatory financial assurance mechanism yet

zh.title: 中国碳减排支持工具 (CERF)
zh.description: 由中国人民银行设立，向金融机构提供 1.75% 的低息资金以定向支持 CCUS 等项目，强调数据真实性与第三方核查。

en.title: PBOC Carbon Emission Reduction Facility (CERF)
en.description: Established by the People's Bank of China to provide 1.75% low-cost funds for CCUS projects, mandating rigorous disclosure and third-party verification of emission data.

zh.title: 欧盟碳边境调节机制 (CBAM)
zh.description: 全球首个碳关税，2026 年起正式征费。CCUS 减排量在经 MRV 核证后，可用于抵减进口产品的嵌入排放强度。

en.title: EU Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM)
en.description: The world's first carbon tariff, effective 2026. Verified CCUS emission reductions can be deducted from the embedded emissions of imported goods.

zh.title: 挪威二氧化碳存储监管体系
zh.description: 全球最成熟的离岸封存管理框架，定义了从勘探许可证到场址关闭后 20 年责任转移给国家的完整流程，支持跨境运输与封存。
zh.liability_transfer: 场址关闭 20 年后转移给国家
zh.cross_border_rules: 全球先行者，已签署伦敦议定书修正案
zh.closure_criteria: 封存场址关闭后 20 年的监测稳定性证据
zh.financial_assurance: 要求提供财务担保以覆盖长期监测成本
zh.incentive_duration_years: 25 年 (长船计划项目生命周期)

en.title: Norway CO2 Storage Regulations
en.description: The world's most mature offshore storage regulatory framework, defining the path from exploration permits to liability transfer to the state 20 years after site closure.
en.cross_border_rules: Global leader; ratified London Protocol amendment
en.closure_criteria: 20 years of monitoring evidence post-closure showing stability
en.financial_assurance: Mandatory security to cover long-term monitoring

zh.title: 加拿大 CCUS 投资税收抵免 (ITC)
zh.description: 加拿大政府推出的核心财政激励措施，通过投资税收抵免（ITC）直接抵消 CCUS 项目的资本支出。捕集设备可获得高达 50% 的抵免，运输与封存设施可获得 37.5% 的抵免。
zh.liability_period_years: 省政府承担，各省周期不同

en.title: Canada CCUS Investment Tax Credit (ITC)
en.description: A primary fiscal incentive to offset capital costs, focusing on dedicated geological storage while explicitly excluding Enhanced Oil Recovery (EOR) projects.

zh.title: 英国 CCUS 发展愿景
zh.description: 英国长期路线图，旨在建立具有全球竞争力的 CCUS 市场。目标到 2030 年实现年封存 2000-3000 万吨二氧化碳，并承诺投入 200 亿英镑支持集群建设。
zh.source: 英国能源安全与净零部

en.title: UK CCUS Vision
en.description: A long-term roadmap to create a competitive market, aiming for 20-30 Mtpa storage by 2030 with a £20 billion funding commitment for cluster sequencing.

zh.title: 澳大利亚保障机制改革 (Safeguard Mechanism)
zh.description: 核心气候政策，要求年排放量超过 10 万吨的工业设施每年强制降低 4.9% 的排放强度，通过惩罚性合规成本驱动油气与重工业对 CCUS 的投资需求。

en.title: Australia Safeguard Mechanism Reform
en.description: Central climate policy mandating a 4.9% annual emissions intensity reduction for large facilities, effectively creating a compliance-driven market for CCUS abatement.

zh.title: 印度尼西亚 2024 年第 14 号总统令 (跨境 CCS 框架)
zh.description: 印度尼西亚政府于 2024 年初发布的里程碑式法规，旨在建立国家 CCS 监管框架。该法案的核心突破是允许将印尼 30% 的碳封存容量分配给跨境二氧化碳来源，标志着印尼正式向亚太地区碳封存枢纽转型。
zh.co2_definition: 受监管物质（包含跨境贸易属性）
zh.closure_criteria: 符合印尼能矿部规定的安全稳定条件
zh.financial_assurance: 要求运营商建立废弃处置储备金

en.title: Indonesia Presidential Regulation No. 14/2024
en.description: Landmark regulation enabling Indonesia to allocate 30% of its storage capacity to international CO2, establishing the first major legal framework for cross-border CCS in Asia.
en.closure_criteria: Safety and stability criteria per MEMR regulations
en.financial_assurance: Mandatory abandonment and site restoration fund

zh.title: 日本 CCS 商业法 (2024)
zh.description: 2024 年 5 月通过，将 CCS 封存权从油气法中剥离并独立化，允许专业运营商获得咸水层封存权，并建立了向国家机构 (JOGMEC) 转移长期责任的机制。

en.title: Japan CCS Business Act (2024)
en.description: Legislation passed in May 2024 decoupling CCS storage rights from oil/gas laws, enabling saline aquifer storage permits and defining a state-backed liability transfer mechanism.

zh.title: 丹麦 CCfD 碳捕捉与封存基金招标机制
zh.description: 丹麦政府推出的为期 20 年的补贴计划，通过竞争性招标（负向招标）确定每吨二氧化碳的差价合约价格，旨在启动丹麦的大规模 CCS 商业化部署。

en.title: Danish CCfD Bidding Mechanism
en.description: A 20-year subsidy scheme based on competitive tendering (Carbon Contract for Difference), designed to kickstart large-scale CCS deployment and position Denmark as a European storage hub.

zh.title: 巴西“未来燃料”法案与 CCS 监管框架 (Bill 528/2020)
zh.description: 巴西首部 CCS 专门法律框架，由国家石油、天然气和生物燃料管理局 (ANP) 监管。法案规定封存授权期通常为 30 年，并明确了运营商在环境风险与长期监测方面的义务。
zh.source: 巴西参议院 / 总统府

en.title: Brazil Fuels of the Future & CCS Framework (Bill 528/2020)
en.description: A comprehensive law establishing Brazil's first legal framework for CCS, governed by ANP. It mandates federal authorization for 30-year storage terms and defines operator liabilities.

zh.title: 韩国 CCUS 法案 (2024)
zh.description: 韩国首部 CCUS 专项综合立法，旨在整合之前分散在 40 多部法律中的审批流程。法案确立了“CCUS 战略集群”制度，并为关键基础设施的建设与运营提供法律支撑与研发补贴。

en.title: South Korea CCUS Act
en.description: A comprehensive new law consolidating CCUS-related regulations from 40+ different acts into a single framework, facilitating 'Strategic Clusters' and streamlining the permitting process.

zh.title: ISO 27914 & 27916 CCUS 国际标准
zh.description: 由 ISO TC265 制定的全球公认标准。ISO 27914 聚焦于专用地质封存的安全性与完整性；ISO 27916 为二氧化碳增强采油 (CO2-EOR) 场景下的封存量化建立了统一核算规则。

en.title: ISO 27914 & 27916 CCUS International Standards
en.description: Constitutes the universal language for CCUS. ISO 27914 focuses on the safety of dedicated storage, while ISO 27916 establishes accounting rules for storage in CO2-EOR scenarios.

zh.title: IPCC 国家温室气体清单指南
zh.description: 2019 年修订版指南为各国在 UNFCCC 框架下报告 CCUS 活动提供了全球公认的科学依据，详细规定了捕集、输送与封存环节的排放量化与泄漏估算方法。

en.title: IPCC Guidelines for National GHG Inventories
en.description: The 2019 Refinement provides the global scientific basis for accounting CCUS activities, enabling nations to report verified emission reductions to the UNFCCC.

zh.title: 欧盟创新基金 (Innovation Fund)
zh.description: 全球最大的支持低碳技术示范的资助计划之一，资金来源于欧盟碳市场 (EU ETS) 拍卖收入。到 2030 年预计投入约 400 亿欧元，重点支持 CCUS 等突破性技术的规模化应用。

en.title: EU Innovation Fund
en.description: One of the world's largest funding programs for low-carbon technologies, expected to deploy ~€40 billion until 2030, with a major focus on full-chain CCUS innovation.

zh.title: 马来西亚 CCS 激励与监管框架
zh.description: 马来西亚政府通过 MIDA 设立的强力财政激励方案，旨在吸引 CCS 运营商与服务商。开发商可申请 10 年期 100% 投资税收抵免，以抵消法定收入，同时享受设备进口税和销售税的全额免除。

en.title: Malaysia CCS Incentives & Regulatory Framework
en.description: Robust tax incentives provided through MIDA to attract CCS operators. Developers can claim 100% ITA for 10 years, alongside full import duty and sales tax exemptions on equipment.

zh.title: 荷兰 SDE++ 运营补贴机制
zh.description: 荷兰核心低碳技术资助计划，采用差价合约 (CfD) 模型，由政府补足项目运营成本与欧盟碳价 (EU ETS) 之间的差额。该机制对 Porthos 等大规模 CCS 项目的财务可行性至关重要。

en.title: Netherlands SDE++ Subsidy Scheme
en.description: A major Dutch subsidy scheme using a CfD model, where the government pays the delta between project costs and EU ETS prices, critical for large-scale CCS financial viability.

zh.title: 加州低碳燃料标准 (LCFS) CCUS 协议
zh.description: 加州首创的市场机制，允许符合条件的 CCUS 项目通过降低燃料碳强度生成可交易积分。该积分可与联邦 45Q 税收抵免叠加，是全球激励强度最高的市场化工具之一。

en.title: California Low Carbon Fuel Standard (LCFS) CCUS Protocol
en.description: A premier market mechanism allowing CCUS projects to generate tradable credits based on CI reduction. LCFS credits can be stacked with federal 45Q credits for maximum incentive value.

zh.title: 中国核证自愿减排机制 (CCER)
zh.description: 中国核证自愿减排机制（CCER）是全国碳排放权交易市场的重要补充机制。通过鼓励自愿减排项目产生可交易的减排量，为 CCUS 等技术路径提供市场化激励。

en.title: China Certified Emission Reduction (CCER)
en.description: China's official voluntary offset scheme, rebooted in 2024. Entities in the national ETS can use CCERs to meet up to 5% of their obligations, with CCUS identified as a priority methodology.

zh.title: 中国零碳工业园区建设指南 (2024)
zh.description: 系统性指导工业园区通过碳捕集与循环利用实现整体脱碳。强调共享运输与封存基础设施的建设，优先支持二氧化碳用于化工合成或驱油 (EOR)。

en.title: China Guidance on Zero-Carbon Industrial Parks (2024)
en.description: Comprehensive guidance for decarbonizing industrial clusters through shared CCUS infrastructure and prioritized utilization in chemical synthesis or EOR.

zh.title: 阿尔伯塔省 TIER 监管法规
zh.description: 阿尔伯塔省针对大型排放源的碳定价系统。设施通过 CCUS 产生的减排量可转化为排放性能积分 (EPC)，用于市场交易或履行合规义务。可与联邦 ITC 叠加，是油砂脱碳的核心动力。

en.title: Alberta TIER Regulation
en.description: Alberta's industrial carbon pricing system. CCUS projects generate tradable Emission Performance Credits (EPCs). Stackable with federal ITC, it serves as the financial pillar for oil sands decarbonization.

zh.title: 挪威“长船”计划与碳税框架
zh.description: 挪威将全球领先的高额离岸碳税与“长船”计划的直接国家投资相结合。政府分担了项目前十年的大部分资本与运营支出，旨在通过公私合营模式降低全链条 CCS 的商业风险。

en.title: Norway Longship & Carbon Tax Framework
en.description: Norway pairs high offshore carbon taxes with the Longship project's direct state funding. The government covers significant capex and opex, creating a blueprint for de-risking full-chain CCS.

zh.title: Verra CCS 方法学 VM0049
zh.description: Verra 发布的 CCS 专项方法学，允许项目在自愿碳市场发行核证碳单位 (VCU)。严格要求额外性论证，并强制执行 100 年的责任监控或通过缓冲池抵御封存风险。

en.title: Verra Methodology VM0049
en.description: Verified Carbon Standard (VCS) methodology for CCS, enabling VCU issuance. It mandates rigorous additionality proof and 100-year liability monitoring or buffer pool mechanisms.

zh.title: 黄金标准 (Gold Standard) CCUS 准则
zh.description: 自愿碳市场的高端标准，支持 CCUS 与 DAC 项目的信用核证。除要求 100 年以上的封存持久性外，还强制要求项目必须对联合国可持续发展目标 (SDGs) 做出额外贡献。

en.title: Gold Standard CCUS Methodology
en.description: A premier voluntary market standard for CCUS and DAC. Beyond 100-year durability, it mandates positive contributions to multiple UN Sustainable Development Goals.

zh.title: Puro.earth 碳移除证书标准
zh.description: 领先的工程化碳移除 (CDR) 标准，专注于核发 CORC 证书。该标准仅认可具有极高地质封存或矿化封存永久性的项目，并通过储备账户机制管理未来风险。

en.title: Puro.earth Carbon Removal Standard
en.description: The primary standard for engineered carbon removal, issuing CORC certificates. It exclusively focuses on projects with verified high geological or mineralized storage permanence.

zh.title: 美国 IIJA 基础设施法案 (CCUS 枢纽专项)
zh.description: 通过《基础设施投资和就业法案》(IIJA) 拨付巨额资金，支持建立大规模区域性 CCUS 枢纽。包含 35 亿美元专门用于直接空气捕集 (DAC) 枢纽的建设，侧重于共享基础设施的规模化。

en.title: US IIJA Infrastructure Act (CCUS Hubs)
en.description: Allocates significant funding via IIJA to establish regional CCUS hubs. Includes a $3.5 billion carve-out for Direct Air Capture (DAC) hubs, focusing on shared infrastructure scalability.

zh.title: 巴西 CCS 综合法律框架 (Bill 1425/2022)
zh.description: 巴西建立的首个全面 CCS 监管框架，明确了运营商的义务、孔隙权属及许可流程，是南美洲 CCS 法律的标杆。
zh.liability_transfer: 场址关闭 30 年后责任转移

en.title: Brazil CCS Legal Framework (Bill 1425/2022)
en.description: The first comprehensive CCS regulatory framework in Brazil, defining operator obligations, pore space rights, and permitting processes.

zh.title: 阿联酋碳管理策略与 ADNOC CCS 计划
zh.description: 阿联酋国家碳管理路线图，依托 ADNOC 建立区域 CCS 枢纽。目前已启动在阿布扎比碳酸盐岩咸水层的二氧化碳注入项目。
zh.liability_transfer: 由国家石油公司 (ADNOC) 统筹
zh.cross_border_rules: 支持区域性 CCS 协作

en.title: UAE Carbon Management Strategy & ADNOC CCS
en.description: UAE national roadmap for carbon management, leveraging ADNOC to build a regional CCS hub, including injection into carbonate saline aquifers.

zh.title: 马来西亚投资发展局 (MIDA) CCS 税收激励
zh.description: 马来西亚通过 MIDA 提供 100% 投资税收抵免 (ITA)，旨在吸引全球 CCS 投资。该政策正在通过简化审批流程建立亚洲领先的 CCS 环境。
zh.pore_space_rights: 属于国家（通过 PETRONAS 管理）

en.title: Malaysia MIDA CCS Tax Incentives
en.description: Malaysia offers 100% Investment Tax Allowance (ITA) through MIDA to attract CCS investment, focusing on streamlined permitting and regional hub status.

zh.title: 德国工业碳管理战略 (KMS)
zh.description: 德国政府于 2024 年发布的战略框架，标志着德国在 CCUS 政策上的重大转向。法案允许对难以减排的行业（如水泥、石灰）实施 CCS，并计划建立全国性的二氧化碳输送基础设施。

en.title: Germany Industrial Carbon Management Strategy (KMS)
en.description: A strategic framework released in 2024 marking a major shift in German policy, allowing CCS for hard-to-abate industries and planning a national CO2 transport network.

zh.title: 法国 2030 CCUS 部署路线图
zh.description: 法国政府推出的 CCUS 专项路线图，旨在通过“法国 2030”计划提供资金支持。目标是到 2030 年实现每年 400-800 万吨的捕集能力，并重点支持工业园区的枢纽化建设。

en.title: France 2030 CCUS Roadmap
en.description: A dedicated roadmap aimed at deploying CCUS via the France 2030 plan, targeting 4-8 Mtpa of capture capacity by 2030 with a focus on industrial hubs.

zh.title: 沙特阿拉伯中东绿色倡议 (MEGI) CCUS 框架
zh.description: 沙特阿拉伯主导的区域性气候行动计划，目标是建立全球最大的 CCUS 枢纽之一。通过与区域国家合作，推动二氧化碳在增强采油 (EOR) 和石化产品生产中的应用。

en.title: Saudi Arabia MEGI CCUS Framework
en.description: A regional initiative led by Saudi Arabia aiming to establish one of the world's largest CCUS hubs, fostering collaboration on EOR and petrochemical utilization.

zh.title: 泰国投资委员会 (BOI) CCUS 税收优惠
zh.description: 泰国政府通过 BOI 提供的专项激励，对符合条件的 CCUS 设备进口提供免关税待遇，并对相关业务提供企业所得税阶段性豁免，以支持东部经济走廊 (EEC) 的脱碳。

en.title: Thailand BOI CCUS Incentives
en.description: Fiscal incentives provided by the Thailand Board of Investment, including import duty waivers on CCUS equipment and corporate income tax exemptions to support industrial decarbonization.

zh.title: 印度国家 CCUS 路线图 (NITI Aayog)
zh.description: 由印度智库 NITI Aayog 发布的权威报告，确立了印度发展 CCUS 的路线图。报告重点探讨了通过类似美国 45Q 的税收抵免机制来吸引投资，旨在解决钢铁和水泥行业的排放问题。

en.title: India National CCUS Roadmap (NITI Aayog)
en.description: A landmark report by NITI Aayog outlining India's CCUS strategy. It discusses the potential for tax credits similar to US 45Q to incentivize capture in steel and cement sectors.

zh.description: 冰岛针对直接空气捕集 (DAC) 与原位矿化封存建立的专项监管体系。依托其独特的地热与玄武岩资源，为 Climeworks 等项目提供了清晰的许可路径与永久性核证标准。

en.description: Specific regulatory framework for Direct Air Capture and in-situ mineralization. Leveraging its basaltic resources, Iceland provides clear permitting for projects like Mammoth.
